pageProduct.name: Andalou Brightening Chia Omega + C Radiant Skin Polish 58ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Fruit stem cell complex, vitamin C, omega-rich emollients, and micro- polishing chia buff away dull, dry, surface cells, gently exfoliating and resurfacing for even tone, smooth texture, and a luminous complexion.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Facial Polish For Normal & Combination Skin Types

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Purified Water (Aqua), Hydrogenated Jojoba Esters, Myristyl Myristate, Stearyl Alcohol, Juglans Regia (Walnut) Powder, Cetyl Alcohol, Borago Officinalis (Borage) Seed Oil*, Salvia Hispanica (Chia) Seed Powder, Linum Usitatissimum (Flax) Seed Oil*, Fruit Stem Cells (Malus Domestica, Solar Vitis) and BioActive 8 Berry Complex*, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract*, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Apricot Isolates, Vanilla Isolate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil* *Certified Organic Ingredients Fair Trade Ingredients

Directions

Gently massage small amount of polish on damp face and neck. Avoid eye and lip area. Rinse clean with cool water.
